Class DangerLevelAIDecision

All Implemented Interfaces:
IShipAIDecision
public class DangerLevelAIDecision
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShipAIDecision

Implementation of a IShipAIDecision for the DangerLevelAI. Keeps the values of the decision of the DangerLevelAI.

Author:
Andreas Günther
